thread.title: This Viral Meryl Streep Singing Meme Gives Your Favorite Songs New Life
thread.title_full: This Viral Meryl Streep Singing Meme Gives Your Favorite Songs New Life

author: Raisa Bruner
title: This Viral Meryl Streep Singing Meme Gives Your Favorite Songs New Life
text:
An image of decorated actor Meryl Streep is making the viral rounds on Twitter recently. The beloved thespian ‚Äòs visage from the 2015 Screen Actor‚Äôs Guild Awards has become the canvas on which meme artists are plying their trade; in this case, that means just adding some familiar lyrics to the photo. The original screenshot captures an elated Streep mid-shout, making it the perfect moment to work for any number of call-and-response song sections. Think everything from Britney Spears to A$AP Ferg.
Thanks, Meryl, for always giving the internet something to get excited about. Below are a few of the best Tweets, some with as many as 100,000 likes.
Britney: my loneliness is killin me
Me: AND I!
Britney: I must confess, I still believe
Me: STILL BELIEVE! pic.twitter.com/VSvdcsepKK 
‚Äî EMANUEL (@blingspice) March 18, 2017 
Meryl Streep: mamma mia 
me: HERE I GO AGAIN pic.twitter.com/V3HT0KmeSE 
‚Äî Meryl Memes (@MerylMemes) March 19, 2017 
DJ at middle school dance: TO THE WINDOWWWW
154 7th graders: TO THE WALL pic.twitter.com/Vr7nukvUAD 
‚Äî Caro (@socarolinesays) March 19, 2017 
A$ap. Ferg: "Coogi down to the socks like I'm Big Poppa"
Me: "B by" pic.twitter.com/sd5i9C7MJv 
‚Äî Uncle Tussy üë¥üèæ (@Tusslindo) March 17, 2017 
Alicia Keys: IN NEW Y RK
Me: CONCRETE JUNGLE WET DREAM TOM TO pic.twitter.com/9VM4tXytHs 
‚Äî üáªüá® Apologen üá±üá∑ (@MissZindzi) March 18, 2017 
"Bill Nye the Science Guy!"
The whole classroom: BILL BILL BILL BILL BILL pic.twitter.com/QPWzikhdeH
